pages.text: Ve iza reakellezine keferu in yettehızuneke illa huzuva(huzuven), e hazellezi yezkuru alihetekum, ve hum bi zikrir rahmani hum kafirun(kafirune)
Hulikal insanu min acel(acelin), seurikum ayati fe la testa’cilun(testa’ciluni)
Ve yekulune meta hazel va’du in kuntum sadıkin(sadıkine)
Lev ya’lemullezine keferu hine la yekuffune an vucuhihimun nare ve la an zuhurihim ve la hum yunsarun(yunsarune)
Bel te’tihim bagteten fe tebhetuhum fe la yesteti’une reddeha ve la hum yunzarun(yunzarune)
Ve lekadistuhzie bi rusulin min kablike fe haka billezine sehıru minhum ma kanu bihi yestehziun(yestehziune)
Kul men yekleukum bil leyli ven nehari miner rahman(rahmani), bel hum an zikri rabbihim mu’ridun(mu’ridune)
Em lehum alihetun temneuhum min dunina, la yestetiune nasre enfusihim ve la hum minna yushabun(yushabune)
Bel metta’na haulai ve abaehum hatta tale aleyhimul umur(umuru), e fe la yerevne enna ne’til arda nenkusuha min etrafiha, e fehumul galibun(galibune)
